nodes.bodyText: @aebadirad @ryanjdew Do you know the reason why these folders aren't under "src/main" to begin with? If they were, we'd only need to grab "src/main" here.
Also, the name "loadData" hurts my head, since it's a "verb + noun" and everything else is "nouns". Guess that ship has sailed though.
artifacts != code, but that's why I designed it that way. Current trajectory seems to be more 'java' oriented, so it may make sense to change that in the future.
we had better use single class import. You can check your java code style configuration. Make sure the option "Use single class import" checked.
I have single class import checked already:
